text: Twipra Kingdom was the ancient kingdom of the Tripuri people of the Bodo- Kachari ethnicity. It is now the state of Tripura in the northeastern region of India. It had a chronicle of 186 kings till the present king (Maharaja Pradyot Kishore Manikya, better known as Kirit Pradyot Deb Burman). Category:Tripura Category:Indian princely states
title: Tripura (princely state)
